column5: This programme will provide you with a solid understanding of the interaction of finance, financial markets and securities and investment analysis and draws extensively from the Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) programme curriculum.INTRODUCTIONYou will also be trained in financial market applications of these theories and concepts in addition to learning how to use state-of-the-art industry analytics in your studies. On graduation, you will have a good understanding of contemporary financial principles and know how these apply to financial intermediation, savings and investment.
column7: UK fees (applies to Channel Islands, Isle of Man and Republic of Ireland) Full-time place, per year - £14,500  International fees Full-time place, per year - £28,000
